blocks.content_html:
Navigation

Unreal Engine C++ API Reference > Runtime > Engine > Engine

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • UObjectBase
  • UObjectBaseUtility
  • UObject
  • UConsole

References

   
Module Engine
Header /Engine/Source/Runtime/Engine/Classes/Engine/Console.h
Include #include "Engine/Console.h"

Syntax

UCLASS (Within=GameViewportClient, Config=Input, Transient, MinimalAPI)  
class UConsole :  
    public UObject ,  
    public FOutputDevice

Remarks

A basic command line console that accepts most commands.

Variables

  Type Name Description
TArray< FAutoCompleteCommand > AutoComplete Current list of matching commands for auto-complete,
int32 AutoCompleteCursor -1: auto complete cursor is not visible, >=0
int32 AutoCompleteIndex Currently selected auto complete index
TArray< FAutoCompleteCommand > AutoCompleteList Full list of auto-complete commands and info
FAutoCompleteNode AutoCompleteTree  
uint32: 1 bAutoCompleteLocked Is the current auto-complete selection locked
uint32: 1 bCaptureKeyInput Indicates that InputChar events should be captured to prevent them from being passed on to other interactions.
uint32: 1 bCtrl True while a control key is pressed.
uint32: 1 bIsRuntimeAutoCompleteUpToDate Do we need to rebuild auto complete?
uint32: 1 bShift True while a shift key is pressed.
FName ConsoleState NAME_Typing, NAME_Open or NAME_None.
TObjectPtr< class ULocalPlayer > ConsoleTargetPlayer The player which the next console command should be executed in the context of.
TObjectPtr< class UTexture2D > DefaultTexture_Black  
TObjectPtr< class UTexture2D > DefaultTexture_White  
TArray< FString > HistoryBuffer Holds the history buffer, order is old to new
FString LastAutoCompletedCommand The most recent input that was autocompleted during this open console session.
FString PrecompletedInputLine The command the user would get if they autocompleted their current input.
int32 SBHead Where in the scrollback buffer are we
int32 SBPos  
TArray< FString > Scrollback Holds the scrollback buffer
UConsole::ScrollbackSelection Selection  
float TextH  
float TextW  
FString TypedStr The command the user is currently typing.
int32 TypedStrPos
